title: The Trustees' (Religious, Educational, etc.) Vesting Act
title_en: The Trustees' (Religious, Educational, etc.) Vesting Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Trustees’ (Religious, Short title.
Educational and Charitable) Vesting Act.
